name: Time Stones
description:
This is an unoriginal short topdown puzzle game.

Controlls

In the game you can Interact with time crystals.

Movement W, A, S, D and / or  arrow keys.  InteractSpace, Z and X Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3-hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

The theme for this jam was Time control.

I made an artpack from the art I made for this game: 
https://pxldev.itch.io/time-stones-assetpack
